Song.title: Jesus, You're My Hope
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Mark Altrogge © 2009 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [E E/D# | C#m7 E/B | A E/G# | F#m7 B]
Verse 1: [E]Jesus, You were tempted{,} in [E/D#]every way like I am [A]But You never gave in, [F#m]no [E]You looked to Your Father{,} [E/D#]and the Spirit’s power [A]For Your strength and self-con[F#m]trol
Chorus: [E]Jesus, You’re my h[Bsus]ope [E/G#]You will help me g[A]row [C#m]I don’t want to sin [G#/B#]I don’t want to give in, [A]NO! Jesus, give me self-con[E]trol [E/D# ⎪ C#m7 E/B ⎪ A E/G# | F#m7 B]
Verse 2: [E]Right at the beginning,{,} [E/D#]when I feel like sinning [A]Help me look to You a[F#m]lone [E]Help me to obey Lord,{,} [E/D#]follow in Your way, Lord [A]Jesus, give me self-cont[F#m]rol
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 jesus you were tempted in every way like i am but you never gave in no you looked to your father and the spirits power for your strength and selfcontrol chorus jesus youre my hope you will help me grow i dont want to sin i dont want to give in no jesus give me selfcontrol verse 2 right at the beginning when i feel like sinning help me look to you alone help me to obey lord follow in your way lord jesus give me selfcontrol
